info.title: Project planning API docs
info.description: API documentation for GoIT project 'Project planning'. [Backend github repository](https://github.com/OlenaTsemko/project-planning-rest-api)

409.description: Invalid email / User is not found

400.description: sprint or project id is not valid

patch.summary: Update time spent on task during the day

400.description: Sprint id or task ID is not valid

get.summary: Get all tasks of the sprint

404.description: Sprint or task is not found

token.description: Session's access token (needed for all requests)

allScheduledTime.description: Whole time spent on the task

sprints.description: Array of user's sprints in one project

taskByDays.description: task days and hours spent on the task

tasks.description: Array of all tasks of one day

byDay.description: Date and hours spent on task
